com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic

Class EnvironmentDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic.EnvironmentDetector

  • public class EnvironmentDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by aravind on 6/9/14. Contains static functions related to detecting the current environments

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectedCallback
      Interface which should be extended to receive callback when environment detection background task is over.
      private class  EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectorAsyncTask
      This class runs the actual environment detection task in a separate thread.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectedCallback callback
      The implementation of EnvironmentDetectedCallback to be called when the environment detection is complete
      private static java.lang.String LOG_TAG 
      static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore manageEnvironmentDetectionCriticalSection
      Semaphore to make sure that only 1 instance of the async task of updating the current environment runs at a time.

      EnvironmentDetector()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void detectCurrentEnvironment(android.content.Context context, EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectedCallback callback)
      Detects the current environment based on the current values of the environment variables.

    • Field Detail

      • LOG_TAG

        private static final java.lang.String LOG_TAG

      • callback

        private EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectedCallback callback
        The implementation of EnvironmentDetectedCallback to be called when the environment detection is complete

      • manageEnvironmentDetectionCriticalSection

        public static final java.util.concurrent.Semaphore manageEnvironmentDetectionCriticalSection
        Semaphore to make sure that only 1 instance of the async task of updating the current environment runs at a time. Async tasks can be run in parallel in Android versions 1.6 to <3.0, but are sequential in other Android versions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnvironmentDetector

        public EnvironmentDetector()

    • Method Detail

      • detectCurrentEnvironment

        public void detectCurrentEnvironment(android.content.Context context,
                            EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectedCallback callback)
        Detects the current environment based on the current values of the environment variables.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity/service context
        callback - The callback is fired when environment detection is complete. The list of current environments wil be returned, with the first element being the one resolved using Overlap resolver
